mapper.update: update JUNGSAN_STATE set to_total= ((select NVL(sum(payment_cash),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공') +(select NVL(sum(payment_card),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공') +(select NVL(sum(payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공')) ,to_cash=(select NVL(sum(payment_cash),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공') ,to_card=(select NVL(sum(payment_card),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공') ,to_point=(select NVL(sum(payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공') ,before_total=((select NVL(sum(payment_cash),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공') +(select NVL(sum(payment_card),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공') +(select NVL(sum(payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공')) ,before_cash=(select NVL(sum(payment_cash),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공') ,before_card=(select NVL(sum(payment_card),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공') ,before_point=(select NVL(sum(payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공') ,state_date=(sysdate)
mapper.delete: delete from JUNGSAN_STATE a where rowid < (select max(rowid) from JUNGSAN_STATE b where a.state_date != b.state_date)
mapper.select: select * from JUNGSAN_STATE
select nvl(sum(payment_cash+payment_card+payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')
select nvl(sum(payment_cash+payment_card+payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date like to_date(sysdate-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')
select nvl(sum(payment_cash),0) from PAYMENT where payment_date like to_date(sysdate-1,'YYYY-MM-DD') and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'
select nvl(sum(payment_card),0) from PAYMENT where payment_date like to_date(sysdate-1,'YYYY-MM-DD') and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'
select nvl(sum(payment_point),0) from PAYMENT where payment_date like to_date(sysdate-1,'YYYY-MM-DD') and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'
select nvl(sum(payment_cash),0) from PAYMENT where payment_date like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'
select nvl(sum(payment_card),0) from PAYMENT where payment_date like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'
select nvl(sum(payment_point),0) from PAYMENT where payment_date like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'

select nvl(sum(sd_qty),0) from SALES_DETAILS where (sd_menu_code like 'MN1' or sd_menu_code like 'MN2') and SD_SALES_NO in (select PAYMENT_SALES_NO from PAYMENT where PAYMENT_DATE like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공')

SELECT nvl(sum(s.sd_qty),0) FROM MENU m,SALES_DETAILS s WHERE m.menu_code = s.sd_menu_code and (menu_mt_code like 'MT3') and SD_SALES_NO in (select PAYMENT_SALES_NO from PAYMENT where PAYMENT_DATE like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공')

SELECT nvl(sum(s.sd_qty),0) FROM MENU m,SALES_DETAILS s WHERE m.menu_code = s.sd_menu_code and (menu_mt_code like 'MT2') and SD_SALES_NO in (select PAYMENT_SALES_NO from PAYMENT where PAYMENT_DATE like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공')

SELECT nvl(sum(s.sd_qty),0) FROM MENU m,SALES_DETAILS s WHERE m.menu_code = s.sd_menu_code and (menu_mt_code like 'MT1') and SD_SALES_NO in (select PAYMENT_SALES_NO from PAYMENT where PAYMENT_DATE like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공')

SELECT nvl(sum(s.sd_qty),0) FROM MENU m,SALES_DETAILS s WHERE m.menu_code = s.sd_menu_code and (menu_mt_code like 'MT1') and SD_SALES_NO in (select PAYMENT_SALES_NO from PAYMENT where PAYMENT_DATE like to_date(sysdate-7,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공')

SELECT nvl(sum(s.sd_qty),0) FROM MENU m,SALES_DETAILS s WHERE m.menu_code = s.sd_menu_code and (menu_mt_code like 'MT3') and SD_SALES_NO in (select PAYMENT_SALES_NO from PAYMENT where PAYMENT_DATE like to_date(sysdate-7,'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공')

select nvl(sum(payment_cash+payment_card+payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date between (select DISTINCT to_char(TRUNC(to_date(sysdate),'MM'))from payment) and (select DISTINCT to_char(last_day(to_date(sysdate))+1,'YYYY/MM/DD')from payment) and payment_date like to_date((select to_char(sysdate-((select to_char(sysdate,'D')from dual)-2 )-7,'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual),'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'

select nvl(sum(payment_cash+payment_card+payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date between (select DISTINCT to_char(TRUNC(to_date(sysdate),'MM'))from payment) and (select DISTINCT to_char(last_day(to_date(sysdate))+1,'YYYY/MM/DD')from payment) and payment_date like to_date((select to_char(sysdate-((select to_char(sysdate,'D')from dual)-2 )-6,'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual),'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'

select nvl(sum(payment_cash+payment_card+payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date between (select DISTINCT to_char(TRUNC(to_date(sysdate),'MM'))from payment) and (select DISTINCT to_char(last_day(to_date(sysdate))+1,'YYYY/MM/DD')from payment) and payment_date like to_date((select to_char(sysdate-((select to_char(sysdate,'D')from dual)-2 )-5,'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual),'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'

select nvl(sum(payment_cash+payment_card+payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date between (select DISTINCT to_char(TRUNC(to_date(sysdate),'MM'))from payment) and (select DISTINCT to_char(last_day(to_date(sysdate))+1,'YYYY/MM/DD')from payment) and payment_date like to_date((select to_char(sysdate-((select to_char(sysdate,'D')from dual)-2 )-4,'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual),'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'

select nvl(sum(payment_cash+payment_card+payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date between (select DISTINCT to_char(TRUNC(to_date(sysdate),'MM'))from payment) and (select DISTINCT to_char(last_day(to_date(sysdate))+1,'YYYY/MM/DD')from payment) and payment_date like to_date((select to_char(sysdate-((select to_char(sysdate,'D')from dual)-2 )-3,'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual),'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'

select nvl(sum(payment_cash+payment_card+payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date between (select DISTINCT to_char(TRUNC(to_date(sysdate),'MM'))from payment) and (select DISTINCT to_char(last_day(to_date(sysdate))+1,'YYYY/MM/DD')from payment) and payment_date like to_date((select to_char(sysdate-((select to_char(sysdate,'D')from dual)-2 )-2,'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual),'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'

select nvl(sum(payment_cash+payment_card+payment_point),0) from payment where payment_date between (select DISTINCT to_char(TRUNC(to_date(sysdate),'MM'))from payment) and (select DISTINCT to_char(last_day(to_date(sysdate))+1,'YYYY/MM/DD')from payment) and payment_date like to_date((select to_char(sysdate-((select to_char(sysdate,'D')from dual)-2 )-1,'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual),'YYYY-MM-DD')and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'

SELECT nvl(sum(payment_cash+payment_card+payment_point),0)FROM payment WHERE payment_date BETWEEN TO_DATE ((select to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from dual), 'yyyy-mm-dd')AND TO_DATE ((select to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from dual), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 0.99999 AND ((TO_NUMBER (TO_CHAR (payment_date, 'hh24mi')) >= 0100 AND TO_NUMBER (TO_CHAR (payment_date, 'hh24mi')) < 0200)) and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'

SELECT nvl(sum(payment_cash+payment_card+payment_point),0)FROM payment WHERE payment_date BETWEEN TO_DATE ((select to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from dual), 'yyyy-mm-dd')AND TO_DATE ((select to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from dual), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 0.99999 AND ((TO_NUMBER (TO_CHAR (payment_date, 'hh24mi')) >= 0200 AND TO_NUMBER (TO_CHAR (payment_date, 'hh24mi')) < 0300)) and PAYMENT_STATE ='성공'

select nvl(sum(order_pr_ea*order_qt),0)from ORDER_INPUT inner join ORDERLIST on ordin_num = order_ordin_num where ordin_end ='종결' and ORDIN_DATE between (select DISTINCT to_char(TRUNC(to_date(sysdate),'MM'))from ORDER_INPUT) and (select DISTINCT to_char(last_day(to_date(sysdate)),'YYYY/MM/DD')from ORDER_INPUT)
SELECT nvl(sum(ROUND((schedule_workingend-schedule_workingstart)*60)),0) FROM schedule where schedule_workingstart like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')

select nvl(sum(round((e.EmpRegister_paytime)*((sc.schedule_workingend-sc.schedule_workingstart)*60) )),0)from EmpRegister e, schedule sc where e.EMPREGISTER_EMPNUM = sc.SCHEDULE_EMPREGISTER_EMPNUM and sc.schedule_workingstart like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') and e.EmpRegister_payclassfiy='시급'

select nvl(sum(e.EmpRegister_payday),0) from EmpRegister e, schedule sc WHERE e.EMPREGISTER_EMPNUM = sc.SCHEDULE_EMPREGISTER_EMPNUM and e.EmpRegister_payclassfiy='월급' and sc.schedule_workingstart like to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')
select count(SCHEDULE_EMPREGISTER_EMPNUM) from schedule where SCHEDULE_WORKINGSTART like to_date(sysdate)
